                             .--'"""""--._
                          .-'  o\\b.\o._o.`-.
                       .-'.- )  \d888888888888b.
                      /.'   b  Y8888888888888888b.
                    .-'. 8888888888888888888888888b
                   / o888 Y Y8888888888888888888888b
                  / d888P/ /| Y"Y8888888888888888888b
                 J d8888/| Y .o._. "Y8888888888888Y" \
                 |d Y888b|obd88888bo. """Y88888Y' .od8
                 Fdd 8888888888888888888bo._'|| d88888|
                 Fd d 88\ Y8888Y "Y888888888b, d888888P
                 d-b 8888b Y88P'     """""Y888b8888P"|
                J  8\88888888P    `m.        """""   |
                || `8888888P'       "Ymm._          _J
                |\\  Y8888P  '     .mmm.YM)     .mMF"'
                | \\  Y888J     ' < (@)>.- `   /MFm. |
                J   \  `YY           ""'   ::  MM @)>F
                 L  /)  88                  :  |  ""\|
                 | ( (   Yb .            '  .  |     L
                 \   bo  8b    .            .  J     |
                  \      "' .      .    .    .  L   F
                   o._.:.    .        .  \mm,__J/  /
                   Y8::'|.            /     `Y8P  J
                   `|'  J:   . .     '   .  .   | F
                    |    L          ' .    _:    |
                    |    `:        . .:oood8bdb. |
                    F     `:.          "-._   `" F
                   /       `::.           """'  /
                  /         `::.          ""   /
              _.-d(          `:::.            F
           .-'.-888b.          `::::.     .  J
         .'   Y888888b.          `::::::::::'
    _.--'     `Y88888888bo.        `::::::d
.--'           `"Y8888888888boo.._   `"dd88b.
           . '     `"Y8888888888888bood8888P `-._
  .-     .             `"Y8888888888888888P      `-._
'                   - .    ""Y88888888888P        ` .`-.
       '       -  -   -   __.   ""Y8888P'             . `.
      .                 _           ""'                 . `.
                                                         .  \
     .                                                    .. \
              _     _                                         L
     .   .-     _                                           . |
           . -                                                |
        .                                                    .|
    |                                                         |
                                                              |
      '                                                       |
    |:                                               ..       F
                                                     | \      F
    |                                                |  L    J
   /           _.---                                 |   L   |
   |       .-     "                                  |   |   F
  |      .'                                          | / |  /|
  |   .-'                                            |/ \| | |
  |_.'                                               |   | F F
  |-'                                                      F |
 /-.                                                      J  |


Running on NodeJS, ExpressJS, CoffeeScript, Stylus, Jade. Fascinating.
Based on Express Boilerplate (https://github.com/suprMax/express-boilerplate)
